TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Optional extends Java.Lang.Object
Public NotInheritable Class Optional Inherits Object
public ref class Optional sealed : Java::Lang::Object

Docs.summary: A container object which may or may not contain a non-null value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Java.Util.Optional Filter(class Java.Util.Functions.IPredicate predicate) cil managed
Public Function Filter (predicate As IPredicate) As Optional

Docs.param: the predicate to apply to a value, if present
Docs.summary: If a value is present, and the value matches the given predicate, returns an Optional describing the value, otherwise returns an empty Optional.
Docs.returns: an Optional describing the value of this Optional, if a value is present and the value matches the given predicate, otherwise an empty Optional

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Java.Util.Optional FlatMap(class Java.Util.Functions.IFunction mapper) cil managed
Public Function FlatMap (mapper As IFunction) As Optional

Docs.param: the mapping function to apply to a value, if present
Docs.summary: If a value is present, returns the result of applying the given Optional-bearing mapping function to the value, otherwise returns an empty Optional.
Docs.returns: the result of applying an Optional-bearing mapping function to the value of this Optional, if a value is present, otherwise an empty Optional

Docs.param: the action to be performed, if a value is present
the empty-based action to be performed, if no value is present

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Java.Util.Optional Map(class Java.Util.Functions.IFunction mapper) cil managed
Public Function Map (mapper As IFunction) As Optional

Docs.param: the mapping function to apply to a value, if present
Docs.summary: If a value is present, returns an Optional describing (as if by #ofNullable) the result of applying the given mapping function to the value, otherwise returns an empty Optional.
Docs.returns: an Optional describing the result of applying a mapping function to the value of this Optional, if a value is present, otherwise an empty Optional

Docs.summary: Returns an Optional describing the given non-null value.
Docs.returns: an Optional with the value present

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Java.Util.Optional OfNullable(class Java.Lang.Object value) cil managed
Public Shared Function OfNullable (value As Object) As Optional

Docs.summary: Returns an Optional describing the given value, if non-null, otherwise returns an empty Optional.
Docs.returns: an Optional with a present value if the specified value is non-null, otherwise an empty Optional

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Java.Util.Optional Or(class Java.Util.Functions.ISupplier supplier) cil managed
Public Function Or (supplier As ISupplier) As Optional

Docs.param: the supplying function that produces an Optional to be returned
Docs.summary: If a value is present, returns an Optional describing the value, otherwise returns an Optional produced by the supplying function.
Docs.returns: returns an Optional describing the value of this Optional, if a value is present, otherwise an Optional produced by the supplying function.

format.a: Java documentation for java.util.Optional.or(java.util.function.Supplier<? extends java.util.Optional<? extends T>>).
